name: PaNinja
description:
This is my first "big" videogame project for Uni.

Music made by: YASUNORI NISHIKI from OCTOPATH TRAVELER. 🎶

It's made with Unity and it's a pixel-art game! 

 🕹 Controls are explained during the game but they are:

-A,D for movement 🏃‍♂️

- W or Spacebar for jumping 🤸‍♀️

And more!! You will unlock different abilities during the game. 

Sorry for the cinematics, I made them with rush haha, but hope you like them. 👾

Thanks so much for playing!🥰🥰🥰

DOWNLOAD IT HERE🔻🔻
